short_description_localized.en: Perfect for active families that want to spend time together

image.name: Stay-Together--Play-Together-Stay-Together--Play-Together
image.caption: Stay Together, Play Together
image.description: Perfect for active families that want to spend time together, this package includes accommodations in a one- or two-bedroom suite, daily breakfast, free for kids under the age of 12, $25/day dining credit (applied to room on departure), complimentary Island Pass, offering savings/discounts on purchases at more than 50 locations around the island, one tennis or golf lesson per child, welcome amenity and complimentary airport transfers for the whole family.Minimum of 1 child must stay
